title: Is it possible to hide androidmanifest.xml
content: I heard from someone today that androidmanifest.xml is hidden by new malware. I couldn't find anything about this on the internet. Is it possible?

comments.text: Depending on the meaning of "hidden", i.e. is it only the content or the file itself, I found these: GitHub Apktool - [BUG] Malware corrupted the android manifest and other files. , [Blogspot: (Not only) Android malware analysis - Having fun with AndroidManifest.xml ]( maldr0id.blogspot.com/2014/09/… )

I heard this in an interview. They said that new mobile malware can work without androidmanifest.xml. I was surprised. I said that I didn't have such knowledge because I had never heard of such a thing before and it didn't make sense. Maybe I misunderstood their question.
